key.name: Stand as a shield to protect those you hold dear! Hone your battle style to focus on attack or defense.
<font color='#FFD200'>Longsword Focus</FONT>\nChannel divine might through your longsword.
<font color='#FFD200'>Shield Focus</FONT>\nTurn your shield into a holy bulwark for your allies.
The god of rage begins to awaken! Turn your dark fury and massive blade against any who would stand against you.
<font color='#FFD200'>Weapon Focus</FONT>\nWield your greatsword with brute strength.
<font color='#FFD200'>Dark Focus</FONT>\nAttack swiftly with the power of darkness.
Kaboom! Swoosh! Zap! Bend the rules of magic to your will and use them to smoosh your foes.
<font color='#FFD200'>Electric/Ice Focus</FONT>\nCombine ice and electric spells in a potent magical offensive.
<font color='#FFD200'>Fire Focus</FONT>\nStoke magical flames to unleash slow but potent spells.
Be reborn as a holy beacon of life! Support allies with a potent array of damaging and healing miracles.
<font color='#FFD200'>Judgment Focus</FONT>\nPray for divine forces to smite the unworthy.
<font color='#FFD200'>Healing Focus</FONT>\nBolster your allies with healing and boosting spells.
Learn a new trick or ten from your old mentor, Haster! Your arrows harness the power of wind and fire.
<font color='#FFD200'>Rapid Fire Focus</FONT>\nAlternate between quick bursts and explosive shots.
<font color='#FFD200'>Aim Focus</FONT>\nMake each arrow count with your long-range, damaging attacks.
Prove your genius with your lapenshard-powered cannon! Launch plasma blasts and a frightening arsenal of missiles at your foes.
<font color='#FFD200'>Missile Focus</FONT>\nHold your ground and unleash overwhelming firepower.
<font color='#FFD200'>Plasma Focus</FONT>\nStay light on your feet while attacking with blasts of plasma.
Don't rest until vengeance is yours! Outwit your opponents with potent poisons and explosive combos.
<font color='#FFD200'>Battle/Poison Focus</FONT>\nAttack with quick combos and powerful poisons.
<font color='#FFD200'>Shadow Focus</FONT>\nNever lose sight of your target, no matter the situation.
Awaken to your lost self, the Rooks' greatest agent! Neutralize your targets with martial skill and the dark arts.
<font color='#FFD200'>Thrown Weapon Focus</FONT>\nUse ancient Rooks techniques to dispatch foes at a distance.
<font color='#FFD200'>Dark Magic Focus</FONT>\nMake use of dark magic to spell doom for your enemies.
Master the two arts of Terrun Calibre! Balance your magic and swordsmanship to unleash a dizzying array of attacks.
<font color='#FFD200'>Blade Focus</FONT>\nFocus on the strength of your swordsmanship, dominating enemies at close range.
<font color='#FFD200'>Rune Focus</FONT>\nChannel blasts of magic through your blade to thwart foes at a distance.
Dominate the streets with brutal kicks and rapid fists! Keep your foes off balance and coat your strikes in dragon flame.
<font color='#FFD200'>Punch Focus</FONT>\nDevastate your foes with a flurry of blinding punches.
<font color='#FFD200'>Kick Focus</FONT>\nCounterattack with powerful kicks when your enemies least expect it.
Become one with Vision and harness incredible power! Your awakened mantras attack enemies and support your allies.
<font color='#FFD200'>Discord Focus</FONT>\nManifest Vision to subdue foes with powerful area attacks.
<font color='#FFD200'>Bonding Focus</FONT>\nUse your soul to attack enemies and heal allies.
